messages.title: A PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM DAVID CAMERON
messages.content: WHY WE NEED CHANGE IN BRITAIN TODAY

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Create and maintain jobs in our economy and our Constituency.
Improve the health service by tackling the deficit and creating the right climate so businesses can flourish.
Increase the number of health visitors to give every family and every child the best start in life.
Supporting local issues, tourism and conservation, town centre regeneration.

mentions.tacticalSituation: We were second at the last General Election in 2005.

issues.economy: Labour's debt leaving the UK with the worst recession in 60 years.
issues.environment: Supporting local issues, tourism and conservation.
issues.governance: Tough on expenses, tough on the causes of expenses.

housing.content: I have never asked for a second home allowance and I donâ€™t run up a Council Housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: I promise I will be different. I will fight the attitude that accepts decline, failure in our society. I will defend common sense and hard work in values, real jobs, personal responsibility, and integrity and fairness at the top of my agenda.

politicalExperience.achievements: Opportunities to create and maintain jobs in our economy and our Constituency.

images.caption: Philip Lardner interacting with the public.
